import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Notification extends Component { state = { nots:[], curTime:"", selectedNotification:"" } takeNotifications = async () =>{ await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/notifications/", method: "GET", headers: { // Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token"), Authorization:"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Y9Kt_w2oQkuVHBpcC2jbBK8SzYqXAIPRGuVzKGJtH34" }, }) .then((response) => this.setState({ nots:response.data.payload.notifications })) .catch(() => console.log("Profil gösterilemedi")); }; selectANot = (aNotification)=>{ this.setState({selectedNotification: aNotification}) } componentWillMount(){ this.takeNotifications(); this.setState({curTime : new Date().toLocaleString()}) } render() { return (

Notifications

{this.state.nots.map((aNotification) => ( ))}
{aNotification.title}
Updated at {this.state.curTime}

{this.state.selectedNotification.title}

{this.state.selectedNotification.from}

{this.state.selectedNotification.note}

); } }
